full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SGROL DKAR GYI TSE SGRUB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(TSE MTHA' YAS DANG PAD DKAR 'CHANG BA YI, ,SGYU 'PHRUL RIM PAR BYON SOGS MKHAS GRUB KYI, ,GZHUNG DANG DAM PA'I MAN NGAG RGYU SKAR KUN, ,'CHAR BYED 'DI KO SNGON MED SA MU DRA, ,'CHI MED TSE YI BDUD RTZI 'O MA'I RGYUN, ,'BYUNG GNAS BCO SPYONGS GSER GYI BUM BZANG STE, ,DUS MIN 'CHI BA'I ZHAGS THAG DUM BU BRGYAR, ,GNOD BYED RNO LDAN DPAL GYI 'DAB MA'ANG YIN, ,SNYAN TSIG GA BUR 'BYUNG KHUNGS TZAN DAN, ,BSOD NAMS GRU CHAR 'BEBS BYED RDZOGS LDAN SPRIN, ,BDE CAN ZHING MCHOG BGROD PA'I THEM SKAS KYANG, ,YIN ZHES BDAG NI MGRIN DBYANGS MTHON POS SROB ,TSUL ''DI SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG @012B SNYOM LAS PA, ,DHARMA BHA DRAS GRU 'DZIN GNYIS PA'I 'DIR, ,DON GRUB GNAM LO'I MGO ZLA'I DMAR PHYOGS KYI, ,DBYANGS KYI RGYAL MO A'AL YIG 'CHAR TSE BRIS, ,DGE BA 'DI YIS MTHA' DAG YID CAN KUN, ,DUS MIN 'CHI BA'I GA-YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL TE, ,RING MIN KHA SBYOR BDUN LDAN ZUNG 'JUG SKUR, ,LDANG BA'I SKAL BZANG DGA' STON MNGON 'GYUR SHOG ,BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL, SA MA YA RGYA RGYA,)
